title: Study uncovers genetic switches that control process of whole-body regeneration

title_detail.value: Study uncovers genetic switches that control process of whole-body regeneration

summary: Researchers are shedding new light on how animals perform whole-body regeneration, and uncovered a number of DNA switches that appear to control genes used in the process.

summary_detail.value: Researchers are shedding new light on how animals perform whole-body regeneration, and uncovered a number of DNA switches that appear to control genes used in the process.
